sentences.en: According to Chinese traditional medicine, start of summer is a key time to moisten the heart.
sentences.cn: 中医认为，立夏是滋润心脏的关键时刻。

sentences.en: She took a sip of water to moisten her dry throat.
sentences.cn: 她抿了一小口水，润一润自己干燥的喉咙。

sentences.en: If you experience difficulty with the superglue not creating a bond with dry wood, moisten the surfaces with water.
sentences.cn: 如果你用强力胶难以粘上干燥的木头，就用水润湿木头表面。
